doc:
Irving Allen Lee https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Irving_Allen_Lee 0 Irving Allen Lee (November 21, 1948 – September 5, 1992) was an African American actor known for playing Detective Calvin Stoner on The Edge of Night from 1977-1984 and Dr. Evan Cooper on Ryan's Hope from 1986-1988. He also appeared in "Ain't Misbehavin" in the late 1970s. He died from an AIDS related illness in 1992, aged 43. Irving_Allen_Lee ( November_21_,_1948 – September_5_,_1992 ) was an_African_American_actor known for playing Detective_Calvin_Stoner on The_Edge of Night from 1977-1984 and Dr._Evan_Cooper on Ryan 's_Hope from 1986-1988 . He also appeared in " Ai_n't_Misbehavin " in the_late_1970s . He died from an_AIDS_related_illness in 1992 , aged 43 .
